name: Clear Your Mind
description:
Clear Your Mind

Help your brain clear your mind all those distracting, confusing, chaotic emotions. The resulting mental tranquility will allow you to go deeper and deeper to a calmed state.

Gamplay

Best to Play in 1920x1080 Full Screen on Itch.io - I can’t guarantee how well it will work in other resolutions (building UI is new for me)

Take a look at the instructions screen within the game, but essentially you move the brain character around and push the colored emotions into their corresponding ‘goals’ on the ring. There are 10 balls in the first level total, spawning every 2.5 seconds, so the lowest possible score would be ~25 seconds.

The Brain doesn’t get hurt, so you can use the 4 sides to act like a pong paddle. You can Left-Click to blast the balls that are in the little zone in front of the player. The Mouse Wheel turns the Character (forgot to mention in the in-game Instructions)

Thoughts

My first Compo (I’ve done a few Jams), and complete solo. As always I found myself spending far too much time learning tools (i.e. GIMP) and debugging the nuances of Unity (i.e. Looking at your WebGL builds that don’t play nice). That said, I enjoyed using GIMP to make my own Art Assets Making my own sound effects was silly, and satisfying, and if I had a bit more time I would have improved the quality. Building UI is just, well atrocious. I feel like UI s is somewhere where I could improve a lot.
